name: Etch-a-pic
description:
It's an Etch-A-Pic!

Your own virtual version of an etch-a-sketch---pic!

Now you don't need to spend 2 bucks! Only 2,000 on a computer!

Comes with an erasing slider and really low quality graphics because I made it in 10 minutes!

#fastgamedevftw! why the heck do i put exclamation marks on the end of EVERYTHING!? this isn't some infomercial

Works like a charm....

(Not the best of my work lol), at least it's free!
